thread.title: Gauhar Khan gets in a BIG TROUBLE because of EX-Boyfriend Kushal Tandon |
thread.title_full: Gauhar Khan gets in a BIG TROUBLE because of EX-Boyfriend Kushal Tandon |

title: Gauhar Khan gets in a BIG TROUBLE because of EX-Boyfriend Kushal Tandon |
text:
Gauhar Khan gets in a BIG TROUBLE because of EX-Boyfriend Kushal Tandon Gauhar Khan gets in a BIG TROUBLE because of EX-Boyfriend Kushal Tandon By: ABP News Web Desk | Last Updated: Tuesday, 14 February 2017 9:55 PM Image Courtesy - Instagram 
New Delhi : Bigg Boss 7 winner Gauahar Khan has got involved into big trouble and it is all because of her ex-boyfriend Kushal Tandon. Gauahar and Kushal were madly in love with each other when they were in the Bigg Boss house. But soon after coming out, they parted ways. The ex-duo hit headlines for their ugly break-up and nasty conversations in public domain. And once again they were in news, however, not for their clash, but for their exchange of sweet messages. 
Recently Kushal Posted a very sweet message for Gauahar, as the actress posed for Stardust Magazine. Kushal wrote “@haiderkhanhaider saw this picture … click by my brother Haider khan ….. could not risisset my self to share this picture of this stunner …. @gauaharkhan lady with grace , panache, ooomp and style with a golden heart …… ????✨” 
Check out this picture: A post shared by Kushal Tandon (@therealkushaltandon) on Feb 12, 2017 at 10:13am PST 
But as soon Stardust magazine saw this post they replied with an official statement. It said: 
Dear Media, 
Stardust would like to clarify that the post of Gauahar Khan on Instagram with the Stardust masthead has nothing to do with us. AJAY DEVGN is gracing the cover of Stardust February issue. We have come across a few articles which state that Gauahar is on the cover, so we would like to clear the air by saying that the news is false. 
Gauahar was also contacted for the same by us and unfortunately she cannot delete the post as she thinks the media will make news of the same and again question her reconciliation with Kushal Tandon. 
And Legal action will be taken against the one who has used the masthead without our permission, thus defying our Company Policy. 
Regards, 
Team Stardust 
As per the sources of Tellychakkar.com, Gauahar did shoot for the magazine but it was not for the cover. 
Well, we can see big trouble coming up for Gauahar Khan. First Published: Tuesday, 14 February 2017 9:52 PM 0
